hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin Volatility Contagion to Blue Chips
hypothesis_content.statement: Extreme volatility events in meme coins (PEPE, DOGE 24h RV > 150%) during BULL regimes create measurable volatility spillover to large-cap altcoins (SOL, AVAX) within 24 hours, offering pairs trading opportunities.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In bull markets, extreme meme coin moves attract attention and capital, creating volatility that eventually spreads to more established altcoins as traders rebalance portfolios. The 'diversify bets' narrative may accelerate this contagion.
entry_conditions: Enter long SOL/AVAX volatility (ATM options) and short PEPE/DOGE volatility via ratio spreads within 4 hours of meme coin spike

exit_conditions.take_profit: SOL/AVAX 24h RV increases to >100% while meme coin RV declines by 30%+
exit_conditions.stop_loss: Meme coin RV continues expanding >200% without spillover after 36 hours

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Meme coin volatility remains isolated without affecting larger altcoins, suggesting segmented market participation or insufficient capital rotation.
